name: Project PVP
description:
“Sometimes you have to pick the gun up to put the Gun down.” ― Malcolm X

The world has changed and only few super heroes left in the world. As
one of the only survivors you learned how to hide and live a normal life
under humans. One day you were forced to use your super powers to
rescue the life of your child Angela and your wife Naomi from a Tornado
which hit your house. Few hours later you were tracked by the ISD
(International Security Department) which sent RW's (Red Walkers) to
find you so you needed to escape from your homeless family.

READ ME
A developer note: I´m currently working in my free time on Project PVP and really need your feedback. I created one tutorial level with few basic features but if you
have any good ideas or if you think I should work on that as main part and develop the final game of that idea, plseae support this project. Ideas, Suggestion, Donations, Posts on your Social Accounts everything what makes this vision become true is really welcome.

The orginal plan is it to focus on Multiplayer 1on1, 2on2 and 3on3 matches where you will fight against others and rank up in season based ladder boards.

A story would be defintely possible, but this is really related to you and what you would prefer more, because doing Multiplayer + Singleplayer takes a lot of time what is unrealistic to archieve as  a single person.

So please leave some comments, opinions, ideas and whatever you think. I will try to catch the best ideas into the concept of the game.

For your information: While developing I will release also constantly new versions, so you can see the progress with the game.

Thank you very much!
